Ian Somerhalder expressed interest in playing the role of Christian Grey, but later admitted that his shooting schedule for 'The Vampire Diaries' would have conflicted with filming 'Fifty Shades of Grey'.
Chace Crawford expressed interest in playing the role of Christian Grey.
Dakota Johnson was cast as Anastasia Steele in 'Fifty Shades of Grey' after being on a short list of other actresses considered for the role.
